message.text:
AftBeing oppressed by these multiple barriers, she showed her irritations at how her efforts, performance and contribution to the organization go unnoticed. This only made matters worse, affecting her own ability to advance in the organization hierarchy even more.  
Her ordeal served as a sharp reminder that the structural inequalities perpetuated within our job market should be acknowledged and tackled. It disclosed the prominent deficiencies in the current career development theories, therefore, both practitioners and theorists should reassess the existing practices and inject multifaceted perspectives that reflect the reality. Thereafter, career development processes will be deliberately generalized to cater for the needs of all, regardless of their social positions, which will ensure fairness and equal opportunity to advance in the chosen careers.
